name: Flor Sparkling
preparation:
Flor de Caña 18-year-old rum is typically enjoyed neat. But a little sparkling water can turn the full-bodied rum into a refreshing drink. Just don’t add more than a splash—you still want to savor the ultra-premium rum’s full-bodied flavor.

Add all ingredients into an Old Fashioned glass over ice.

Garnish with an orange twist.
